title: Algebra Practice - Linear Equations
description: Complete exercises 1-20 from Chapter 3. Focus on solving linear equations with one variable. Show all work and check your solutions.

title: Essay Writing - Shakespeare Analysis
description: Write a 500-word essay analyzing the themes in Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet'. Focus on love, fate, and family conflict. Include proper citations.

title: Math Quiz Preparation
description: Review chapters 1-4 for upcoming quiz. Practice problems include: quadratic equations, factoring, and graphing. Quiz will be 45 minutes.

title: Biology Lab Report - Cell Structure
description: Complete lab report on cell structure observation. Include microscope drawings, labeled diagrams, and analysis of cell components.

title: History Research Paper - Ancient Egypt
description: Research and write a 3-page paper on Ancient Egyptian civilization. Cover government, religion, and daily life. Use at least 3 sources.

title: Art Portfolio - Color Theory
description: Create a portfolio demonstrating color theory concepts. Include primary, secondary, and tertiary color wheels. Use various media.

title: Physics Problem Set - Newton's Laws
description: Solve problems 1-15 from Chapter 5. Focus on Newton's three laws of motion. Show all calculations and free-body diagrams.

title: Chemistry Lab - Chemical Reactions
description: Complete lab experiment on chemical reactions. Record observations, write balanced equations, and analyze results.

title: English Literature - Poetry Analysis
description: Analyze three poems from our anthology. Focus on theme, imagery, and poetic devices. Write 2-3 paragraphs per poem.

title: Mathematics - Geometry Proofs
description: Complete geometric proofs for triangles and quadrilaterals. Use two-column proof format. Problems 1-10.

title: Biology - Genetics Problems
description: Solve Punnett square problems for monohybrid and dihybrid crosses. Include probability calculations and explanations.

title: History - World War II Timeline
description: Create a detailed timeline of major events in World War II. Include dates, key figures, and significance of each event.

title: Art - Perspective Drawing
description: Create three perspective drawings: one-point, two-point, and three-point perspective. Use proper vanishing points.

title: Physics - Energy Conservation
description: Solve problems involving kinetic and potential energy. Calculate energy transformations in various scenarios.

title: Chemistry - Stoichiometry
description: Complete stoichiometry problems involving mass-mass, mass-volume, and volume-volume relationships.

title: English - Creative Writing
description: Write a short story (2-3 pages) using the elements we discussed: plot, character, setting, and conflict.

title: Mathematics - Calculus Derivatives
description: Find derivatives of polynomial, exponential, and trigonometric functions. Use power rule, chain rule, and product rule.

title: Biology - Ecology Field Study
description: Conduct a field study of local ecosystem. Identify species, measure biodiversity, and analyze environmental factors.

title: History - Current Events Analysis
description: Analyze three current events articles. Connect them to historical themes and patterns we've studied.

title: Art - Digital Design Project
description: Create a digital design using graphic design software. Incorporate principles of design: balance, contrast, unity.
